con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v1="http://kpn.com/products/WMP/email/data/v1.0" xmlns:ns="http://kpn.com/eai/generic/order/1.0" xmlns:wmp="http://kpn.com/products/WMP"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <v1:emailreadResponse> <!--Optional:--> <ns:customerOrderId>?</ns:customerOrderId> <ns:supplierOrderId>?</ns:supplierOrderId> <!--Optional:--> <ns:error> <ns:code>?</ns:code> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ns:detail>?</ns:detail> <ns:description>?</ns:description> </ns:error> <v1:status>?</v1:status> <v1:OrderItem> <wmp:productInstanceId>?</wmp:productInstanceId> <!--Optional:--> <wmp:refOrderId>?</wmp:refOrderId> <!--Optional:--> <v1:Parameters> <!--Optional:--> <v1:emailName>?</v1:emailName> <!--Optional:--> <v1:size>?</v1:size> <!--Optional:--> <v1:spamFilter>?</v1:spamFilter> <!--Optional:--> <v1:virusScan>?</v1:virusScan> <!--Optional:--> <v1:pop3Access>?</v1:pop3Access> <!--Optional:--> <v1:smtpAccess>?</v1:smtpAccess> <!--Optional:--> <v1:imapAccess>?</v1:imapAccess> <!--Optional:--> <v1:webmailAccess>?</v1:webmailAccess> <!--Optional:--> <v1:pushEmail>?</v1:pushEmail> <!--Optional:--> <v1:fullOutlookAccess>?</v1:fullOutlookAccess> <!--Optional:--> <v1:tasks>?</v1:tasks> <!--Optional:--> <v1:notes>?</v1:notes> <!--Optional:--> <v1:calendar>?</v1:calendar> <!--Optional:--> <v1:contacts>?</v1:contacts> <!--0 to 5 repetitions:--> <v1:alias>?</v1:alias> <!--Optional:--> <v1:forwardingEnabled>?</v1:forwardingEnabled> <!--Optional:--> <v1:forwardingEmailAddress>?</v1:forwardingEmailAddress> <!--Optional:--> <v1:forwardingLocalCopy>?</v1:forwardingLocalCopy> <!--Optional:--> <v1:autoReplyEnabled>?</v1:autoReplyEnabled> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <v1:autoReplyText>?</v1:autoReplyText> </v1:Parameters> </v1:OrderItem> </v1:emailreadResponse> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
